issuetype.description: A new feature of the product, which has yet to be developed.
issuetype.name: New Feature

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: This issue was once resolved, but the resolution was deemed incorrect. From here issues are either marked assigned or resolved.
status.name: Reopened

fields.description:
I can't set the translucent property to false on tab groups like navigation bars, and looking at xcode the option is avaliable in the component, so it's not implemented in titanium?

<TabGroup translucent="false">
fields.summary: iOS7: Can't set TabGroup translucent on/off

comments.body:
Hello,

Can you please explain more details? Thanks

Hi Santi,

Thanks for requesting this new feature. Our Engineering/Products Management team will review and consider scheduling it for future release.

Thanks,
Shak

This issue was previously scheduled to be worked on in more than one sprint:
* 'Release 3.1.2' (on board '3.1.X Triage')
* 'Release 3.0.1/TS 3.0.2' (on board '3.1.0 Triage')
* 'Triage' (on board '3.2.X Triage')

Starting from JIRA Agile 6.3, an issue can only belong to a single future sprint. Read more about this change: http://docs.atlassian.com/agile/docs-0630/Sprint+Marker+Migration

This issue is now scheduled for future sprint 'Release 3.1.2' (on board '3.1.X Triage').

If this is incorrect, please update the issue accordingly.

This comment was automatically generated by JIRA. If it is no longer relevant, please feel free to delete it.
